title: Discussion-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Discussion-based training program for enhancing pharmaceutical practice competencies targeting healthcare professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically construct arguments based on academic evidence related to discussion topics.
Learners can comprehensively utilize critical thinking, communication skills, and teamwork during discussions.
Learners achieve at least a 30% improvement in knowledge related to discussion topics through pre-post quizzes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
